data.event: With these deaths, the number of people that have been killed in the West Midlands from the disease has now increased to 19.

event.title: admitted to hospitals in the region with the disease this week

data.event: NHS West Midlands has said that the number of people admitted to hospitals in the region with the disease this week was 203, whereas last week there were 146.

event.title: taken into hospitals in the area was 95 from this Wednesday

data.event: It was also said that the number of inpatients taken into hospitals in the area was 95 from this Wednesday onwards.
